entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind south 30 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 50 this morning then north 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 23 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning overnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 25.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
